oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Physics possibilities at India-based Neutrino observatory
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SANKAR, SU
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: atmospheric neutrinos
oscillations
matter
neutrino oscillations
matter effects
mass hierarchy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this talk I review the physics possible at India-based Neutrino Observatory (INO). I discuss the improvement in the precision of currently known quantities and the possibility measuring the presently unknown quantities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 9th Workshop on High Energy Physics Phenomenology (WHEPP-9),Bhubaneswar, INDIA,JAN 03-14, 2006
